_exec_summary.SummaryText:
THE SAFETY AND WELL BEING OF OUR EMPLOYEES AND MEMBERS OF THE COMMUNITY OF WALTERS, MN DEPEND ON US AND OUR CAREFULL HANDLING AND STORAGE OF NH3 AT OUR SITE. BY FOLLOWING THE GUIDELINES SET BY THE MN DEPT OF AGRICULTURE FOR SAFE HANDLING AND STORAGE OF NH3 WE CAN PREVENT ACCIDENTAL RELEASE OF NH3. WIM FERTILIZER HANDLES AND STORES NH3 NITROGEN FERTILIZER FOR SALE TO AREA FARMERS. WE RECEIVE PRODUCT BY SEMI-TRANSPORTS, AND REFILL PORTABLE NURSE TANKS USED BY FARMERS TO MAKE DELIVERY TO THEIR FIELDS.                                                                                                                                                                                                                             

 WIM FERTILIZER STORES NH3 IN (2) 12,000gal STORAGE TANKS.                                                                                                                                                                                                                             

REGULAR SAFETY MEETINGS ALONG WITH SAFE HANDLING REVIEWS ARE HELD.                                                                                                                                                                                                                            

OUR OPERATION IS MONITORED BY THE MN DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE TO ENSURE OUR STORAGE AND DELIVERY SYSTEM MEETS THE CURRENT STANDARDS FOR SAFETY.                                                                                                                                                                                                                            

IN THE EVENT OF AN ACCIDENTAL RELEASE  OF NH3 THE FARIBAULT COUNTY SHERIFFS OFFICE, ALONG WITH LOCAL FIRE DEPARTMENTS WILL BE DISPATCHED.                                                                                                                                                                                                                            

OUR COMPANY HAS NOT HAD AN ACCIDENTAL RELEASE OF NH3 IN OUR HISTORY.
